trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_SEQ_00<tab>Lock up your arcanists and hide the heavy equipment, Master Gegeruju is feeling bored.
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_SEQ_01<tab>Master Gegeruju's idea is refreshingly harmless. In order to call up the winds, first collect three cores from wind sprites.
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_SEQ_02<tab>You collected three wind sprite cores. Place them at the tip of the nearby cliffs to summon a storm sprite.
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_SEQ_03<tab>Nature is not to be trifled with─the storm sprite attacks you. Report to Master Gegeruju.
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_SEQ_04<tab>Far from apologetic, Master Gegeruju pouts that he only felt a whiffle. There is no greater adventure than serving at his pleasure.
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_TODO_01<tab>Place the wind sprite cores at the tip of the cliffs.
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_GEGERUJU_000_000<tab>Excellent timing, come, come! Such a still, wilting day and I had a thought─a little thought, a violet not a rose─to call up a refreshing breeze.
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_GEGERUJU_000_001<tab>The wind sprites now, you can get a healthy puff or two out of them. It follows that a powerful sprite can set a whole city aflutter!

TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_GEGERUJU_000_002<tab>According to my best calculations─or rather my <var 1A 02 /var>second<var 1A 01 /var> best calculations, no need to ask how or why─collecting three cores from wind sprites should permit you to summon a more powerful specimen.
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_GEGERUJU_000_003<tab>Won't someone─present company definitely included─carry out my genius plan? Will someone deign to collect this handsome reward?
TEXT_GAIUSB310_00851_GEGERUJU_000_031<tab>So only <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> enjoyed a refreshing buffeting? I had but a whimpering whiffle! Oh, phooey, now I shall be bored again.
